name: Piet Mondrian and the Missing Colors
name_original: Piet Mondrian and the Missing Colors
description: This is my game submission for the 2020 Paint Jam! It's called "Piet Mondrian and the Missing Colors". You have to help Piet recover the colors from his painting called "Tableau I", which magically vanished. I have to mention that all drawings/ photo edits were made using MS Paint ( and Paint 3D). I hope you like this game! For any critics or contacts, this is my e-mail: edycotirta0502@gmail.com
